dictionary.string: "uniform float timeFactor=1;&#000a;uniform float texFactor=10;&#000a;uniform float ampFactor=0.01;&#000a;//just like rotate pixel according to texture coordinate&#000a;vec2 uv = UV;&#000a;uv.x+=sin(TIME*timeFactor+UV.x*texFactor)*ampFactor;&#000a;uv.y+=cos(TIME*timeFactor+UV.y*texFactor)*ampFactor;&#000a;COLOR=tex(TEXTURE,uv) * SRC_COLOR;&#000a;"
